attributes.long-description:
This ultimate bundle includes Sound Shapes™ and all playable add-on packs:

- Lizzywanders Art Pack
- Future Funk 3000 Sound Pack
- Hohokum™ Art and Sound Pack
- City Art Pack
- Nature Art Pack
- Dubstep Sound Pack
- 80’s Sound Pack
- Acoustic Sound Pack
- Vocoder Sound Pack
- Car Mini-Album & Entity Pack
- Old School Sound Pack
- Drums Sound Pack
- Brass Sound Pack
- 8-Bit Sound Pack
- Curved Terrain Pack

Part platformer, part music creator, Sound Shapes™ is the award winning & critically acclaimed game from Queasy Games (Everyday Shooter) that combines sight and sound into a truly unique gaming experience. Play through albums by Beck, deadmau5, and Jim Guthrie all beautifully illustrated by artists from Capy (SUPER TIME FORCE, Might & Magic: COH), Pyramid Attack (Jabbawaki, Guitar Hero), and Superbrothers (Sword & Sworcery).

And when you've completed the Campaign, flip through the C ommunity Milkcrate for a selection of developer and guest curated albums that feature the best of the best from the Sound Shapes community OR check out the Level Editor (a full-on music synthesizer!) to create your own musical levels! Practically infinite replay value!

For one price, get this bundle on PS4™, PS3™ and PlayStation®Vita systems. Purchase it on one system and it will automatically appear for download on your other systems.



Use of PSN and SEN account are subject to the Terms of Service and User Agreement and applicable privacy policy (see terms at sonyentertainmentnetwork.com/terms-of-service & sonyentertainmentnetwork.com/privacy-policy). *Online multiplayer also requires a PlayStation®Plus subscription.

1080p HD Video Output
Online Play (Optional)

Software subject to license (us.playstation.com/softwarelicense). Online activity subject to Terms of Services and User Agreement (www.playstationnetwork.com/terms-of-service). One-time license fee for play on account’s designated primary PS4™ system and other PS4™ systems when signed in with that account.

©2012 Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC. Sound Shapes is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America LLC.
